sn35.166:1.3: “katham nu kho, bhante, janato katham passato sakkayaditthi pahiyati”ti?
sn35.166:1.4: “Cakkhum kho, bhikkhu, dukkhato janato passato sakkayaditthi pahiyati.
sn35.166:1.5: Rupe dukkhato janato passato sakkayaditthi pahiyati.
sn35.166:1.6: Cakkhuvinnanam dukkhato janato passato sakkayaditthi pahiyati.
sn35.166:1.7: Cakkhusamphassam dukkhato janato passato sakkayaditthi pahiyati …pe…
sn35.166:1.8: yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi dukkhato janato passato sakkayaditthi pahiyati.
sn35.166:1.9: Evam kho, bhikkhu, janato evam passato sakkayaditthi pahiyati”ti.
